Consider a Vacation That is Closer to Home with Le Boat Le Boat Consider a luxury private boat rental vacation with Le Boat on the UNESCO World Heritage Rideau Canal, just next door in Ontario Canada. No previous boating experience or license required!

Le Boat offers the opportunity to get away from your home and into your home on the water. It's a personal space for you and your family or close friends with everything you need for a comfortable stay on board.
